ui.outputpanels

Class Graph3DPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ui.outputpanels.OutputPanel
              • ui.outputpanels.Graph3DPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Graph3DPanel
extends OutputPanel
    This class defines the GraphPanel that allows for a 3D plot of three variables Features not support yet: PopupListener and Popup menu, Zoom box, print, export
    Author:
    Andres Perez 09, modified by Clinic 10-11
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Graph3DPanel

        public Graph3DPanel(TabbedOutputPanel owner,
            ODEVarVector current,
            ODEVar x,
            ODEVar y,
            ODEVar z)
        Constructor that creates a new OutputPanel given a TabbedOutputPanel. Instantiates a toolbar and plot panel, as well as dialogs for changing the labels and scaling the window ranges.
        Parameters:
        owner - the TabbedOutputPanel to which the GraphPanel belongs
        current - the ODEVarVector for the current ODE
        x - the variable to display on x-axis, initially
        y - the variable to display on y-axis, initially
        z - the variable to display on z-axis, initially

    • Method Detail

      • getVariables

        public ODEVarVector getVariables()
        Returns the variables of the current ODE.
        Returns:
        the variables of the current ODE

      • getVar

        public ODEVar getVar(int axis)
        Returns the ODEVar corresponding to the given axis index.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis index - 0 for x, 1 for y, and 2 for z
        Returns:
        the ODEVar corresponding to the given axis index

      • setVar

        public void setVar(int axis,
          int index)
        Set the variable on the axis corresponding to the given axis index.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis index - 0 for x, 1 for y, and 2 for z
        index - the index of the variable to be shown on that axis

      • getPlot3DPanel

        public org.math.plot.Plot3DPanel getPlot3DPanel()
        Returns the plot panel contained in this Graph3DPanel.
        Returns:
        the Plot3DPanel associated with this Graph3DPanel

      • getPlot3DState

        public Plot3DState getPlot3DState()
        Returns the plot state that represents this Graph3DPanel's plot panel.
        Returns:
        the Plot3DState representing the inner plot panel.

      • setAllAutoScale

        public void setAllAutoScale(boolean autoScaleState)
        This function is called any time auto-scaling is toggled. It updates the status of auto-scaling in the toolbar and the Plot3DPanel's right-click menu, and activates/de-activates the auto-scaling feature.
        Parameters:
        autoScaleState - true if auto-scaling is set to on, false otherwise

      • setAllGrid

        public void setAllGrid(boolean gridOn)
        This function is called any time grid lines are toggled. It updates the status of grid lines in the toolbar and activates/de-activates the grid in the plot panel.
        Parameters:
        gridOn - true if grid lines are set to visible, false otherwise

      • setAxisLogScale

        public void setAxisLogScale(int axis,
                   boolean logScaleOn)
        Sets the desired axis to logarithmic scaling, then updates the toolbar.
        Parameters:
        axis - int representing the axis (0 = x, 1 = y, and 2 = z)
        logScaleOn - true if the axis is log-scaled

      • updateDialogs

        public void updateDialogs()
        Updates the label dialog according to its options

      • updateTool

        public void updateTool()
        This function is called any time the mouse action tool is changed. It updates the tool selector in the toolbar and the radio buttons in the Plot3DPanel's right-click menu.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the displayed data, resets the scale settings to default, and empties the Plot3DPanel.
        Specified by:
        clear in class OutputPanel

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints the GraphPanel, and repaints the PlotPanel.
        Overrides:
        paint in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object corresponding to panel display.

      • gainedFocus

        public void gainedFocus()
        When the 3D plot tab is clicked, redraw the plot.
        Overrides:
        gainedFocus in class OutputPanel

      • solutionReceived

        public void solutionReceived()
        This function is called any time a new solution is to be painted on the Plot3DPanel. It calls the appropriate drawing methods through the plot state and stores new ranges for the scaling dialog.
        Specified by:
        solutionReceived in class OutputPanel

      • getTabName

        public java.lang.String getTabName()
        Returns the name that should be on this graph's tab
        Specified by:
        getTabName in class OutputPanel

      • canPrint

        public boolean canPrint()
        Returns whether this Graph3DPanel can print. For now, 3D does not support printing or exporting.
        Specified by:
        canPrint in class OutputPanel
        Returns:
        true iff this Graph3DPanel can print
